alert.note: Alert for Upper Koyukuk Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 21 at 2:37PM AKST until January 22 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM AKST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow with low visibility. Plan on difficult travel conditions. Visibility will be one half mile or less at times. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches are expected. * WHERE...Summits of Dalton Highway. * WHEN...Until 6 PM Saturday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...East winds gusting to 45 mph will cause blowing and drifting snow over Dalton Highway Summits. Large snow drifts will form. Winds expected to decrease early Saturday morning. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Weather Advisory for snow and blowing snow means periods of snow and blowing snow will cause travel difficulties. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
